channel.title: Fixing my magic
channel.description:
I'm using delta base, demise source.
I would like to know how to fix this:
When I attack somebody with magic, and they are running, the magic gfx show up way behind them.
Also, I'd like to make it so magic splashes less. It splashes like 80% of the time.
Thanks for the help.

item.title: Fixing my magic
item.dc:creator: @xtylerr xtylerr
item.description:
@xtylerr wrote:

I don’t think you understand what the problem is…

My magic works find…there are just some small errors.

Magic splashes wayyy too often, and the gfx lag behind people.

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing my magic
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Change it from this code if (magicID == 12891) // Ice barrage { if (playerLevel[6] >= 94) { if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6) == false)) { sendMessage( "You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6) == true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); setAnimation(1979); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; addSkillXP((800 * playerLevel[6]), 6); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if (playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }
into this code (this one has sM)

                        if (magicID == 12891) // Ice barrage
                        {
                            if (playerLevel[6] >= 94) {
                                if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == false)
                                        || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)
                                                == false)
                                                || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)
                                                        == false)) {
                                    sM("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
                                } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == true)
                                        && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2) == true)
                                        && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6) == true)) {
                                    hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25);
                                    setAnimation(1979);
                                    inCombat();
                                    PkingDelay = 15;
                                    addSkillXP((800 * playerLevel[6]), 6);
                                    stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
                                    deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4);
                                    deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2);
                                    deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 6);
                                    teleportToX = absX;
                                    teleportToY = absY;
                                }
                            } else if (playerLevel[6] <= 93) {
                                sM("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell.");
                            }
                        }

There will probably be errors, tell me what they are so I can try to fix them for you

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing my magic
item.dc:creator: @xtylerr xtylerr
item.description:
@xtylerr wrote:

Yeah, it’s sM

where do I add that?

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing my magic
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

What source are you – oh

                        if (magicID == 12891) // Ice barrage
                        {
                            if (playerLevel[6] >= 94) {
                                if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == false)
                                        || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)
                                                == false)
                                                || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)
                                                        == false)) {
                                    sendMessage(
                                            "You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
                                } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == true)
                                        && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2) == true)
                                        && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6) == true)) {
                                    hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25);
                                    setAnimation(1979);
                                    inCombat();
                                    PkingDelay = 15;
                                    addSkillXP((800 * playerLevel[6]), 6);
                                    stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
                                    deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4);
                                    deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2);
                                    deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 6);
                                    teleportToX = absX;
                                    teleportToY = absY;
                                }
                            } else if (playerLevel[6] <= 93) {
                                sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell.");
                            }
                        }

Adapt it to your source.
Means like instead of sendMessage it could be sM. Don’t know much about Demise Pking since it never worked on my computer.

Read full topic
